article.title: Current Awareness Bibliographies in the State Information System
article.author: Briskman, M.A.
article.text: Notes that at present the current awareness bibliography of Soviet publications (which is provided, in some form or other almost in all of the areas of knowledge, production, or culture) fails to ensure complete enough information even with respect to directly related literature. A set of measures are suggested, aimed at a cardinal improvement of the listings in the state bibliography system..
